thread.title: Barcelona Reportedly Interested In Hiring Premier League Manager
thread.title_full: Barcelona Reportedly Interested In Hiring Premier League Manager

title: Barcelona Reportedly Interested In Hiring Premier League Manager
text:
Barcelona Reportedly Interested In Hiring Premier League Manager Wed Feb 08 2017 21:39:12   21:39:12 GMT+0000 (GMT) Nasir Jabbar Nasir Jabbar in football 
If Frank de Boer's agent is anything to go by, then there could be some worrying news for Everton fans. 
According to Guido Albers, Barcelona are interested in hiring Ronald Koeman as their manager should current boss Luis Enrique reject a new contract. 
The Spaniard's deal expires in the summer with no new contract yet ironed out. Enrique detailed the toughness of the gig which put his future into doubt. (Koeman receives a warm welcome from Goodison Park) 
Needless to say, Barca are keeping tabs on a select few if the position does ultimately become vacant. And it appears they are keen on their former player. 
Albers was asked if his client was in the running for the job, but shot down the idea saying; " No, I do not think. " He told TuttoMercatoWeb . (Koeman and Hristo Stoitchkov hold aloft the Champions League) 
That's despite being a club legend; "Frank is a piece of Barcelona history, but I think the club has in mind other technicians." 
Which other technicians? Well, per Albers names "l ike Ronald Koeman, now at Everton ." 
Could the lure of returning to the iconic Nou Camp prove too hard to turn down? Watch this space. Sponsored Links
